dh.name: Dark Horde
description:
Dark Horde

Units:
25% spell damage reduction
+10% buy cooldown
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+20% damage
+300 Tower range
200 minimum Tower range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Magic:
Blind Rage (+25% attack rate to 1 unit)
Dark Pact (Summons 1 unit)
Rain of Fire (125 damage in 225 AoE)

Traits: Very physical and brutal. Prefers close quarters face to face battle style. Fuck serving Demons. Fuck playing nice with others. Fuck weaklings and friendly collateral damage. TRUE Horde is here!

Difficulty: Skilled

Dark Horde

Units:
20% spell damage reduction
+10% buy cooldown
-5% evasion

Buildings:
+20% damage
+300 Tower range
200 minimum Tower range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Magic:
Blind Rage (+25% attack rate to 1 unit)
Dark Pact (Summons 1 unit)
Rain of Fire (125 damage in 225 AoE)

Traits: Very physical and brutal. Prefers close quarters face to face battle style. Fuck serving Demons. Fuck playing nice with others. Fuck weaklings and friendly collateral damage. TRUE Horde is here!

Difficulty: Skilled

bonuses.name: Twilight Mauler [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Serrated Weapons

Twilight Mauler replaces Red Drake
Siege Unit (Ground/Melee)
+10% attack rate
+8 damage
+100 HP
Abilities:
Brutal Weapon (Passive Skill)
(4x damage to Heroes)
(attacks cannot miss)
Enrage (Self Spell)
(+50% attack rate after a kill)
(lasts 15 sec)
Upgrades used:
Dark Iron Weapons
Dark Iron Armor
Serrated Weapons
Beast Armor
True Horde Resolve

Type: Anti Hero
This fucking IDIOT wanders around ignoring Heroes... Be smart about when you buy him.

heroes.name: Hammer of the Light
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Blinding Light (Disable Spell)
70% miss chance for 6-12 sec
(150-300 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Hammer Time (Passive Skill)
knockback every 8-4 sec

Regeneration (Self Spell)
300-600 HP over 10 sec

Divine Shield (Self Spell)
12-18 sec near invulnerability

dw.name: Dwarf
description:
Ironforge Dwarf

Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Holy Radiance (100 HP in 200 AoE)
Thunder Clap (100 damage in 200 AoE)
Stoneskin (+6 armor to 1 unit)

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

Ironforge Dwarf

Units:
+2 armor
-10% attack rate
-5% hit points

Buildings:
+10% hit points

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Magic:
Stoneskin (+4 armor to 1 unit)
Holy Radiance (100 HP in 175 AoE)
Thunder Clap (100 damage in 175 AoE)

Traits: What they lack in magic and spells, Dwarves make it up in their ingenuity. Weak starting units, but powerful late game mechanical contraptions that are resistant to almost all magic effects.

Difficulty: Advanced

bonuses.name: Mechanic [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Rifled Guns

Mechanic replaces Rifleman
Ranged Unit
-300 range
+10% attack rate
+2 armor
+50 HP
Abilities:
Repair (Healing Spell)
(heals 200 HP to 1 unit)
(affects mechanical units only)
Repair Aura (Support Aura)
(+4 HP/s in 600 AoE)
(affects mechanical units only)
Upgrades used:
Gunpowder
Mithril Armor
Sharpshooting
Rifled Guns

Type: Healing
Great healer. One tiny problem. He stays in front of Tanks and dies before they need healing.

hu.name: Lordaeron
description:
Lordaeron

Units:
+10% attack rate

Buildings:
+1 armor

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Holy Light (100 HP to 1 unit)
Blizzard (90 damage in 225 AoE)
Resurrection (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Jacks of all trades but masters of none. Very basic and simple, but versatile and adaptive. Good in every situation, foolproof and idiotfriendly. Easy to play and very boring. Recomended for total Noobs.

Difficulty: Beginer
